mapper.insert: insert into partner_rela_area (partner_id, area_id, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{partnerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
